com.example.demo.forum.delegates

Class QuestionControllerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.forum.delegates.QuestionControllerDelegate

  • @Component
public class QuestionControllerDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    Delegate for QuestionsApiController which implements the api endpoints. QuestionsRepository is injected via constructor to provide support for jpa operations.

    • Method Detail

      • addQuestion

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionDetails> addQuestion(PostQuestionReplyBody body)
        addQuestion endpoint implementation. Input question details are used to create the new question in DB.
        Parameters:
        body - question request body of type PostQuestionReplyBody.
        Returns:
        questionDetails of type QuestionDetails of the new question Added.
        Throws:
        QuestionsApiException - runtime exception if an error occurs during JPA operation.

      • createReply

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PostReplyResponse> createReply(java.lang.Long questionId,
                                                                              PostQuestionReplyBody requestBody)
        createReply endpoint implementation. Input reply details are used to create the new reply in DB for a given question.
        Parameters:
        requestBody - question request body of type PostQuestionReplyBody.
        questionId - input questionId for the reply is saved.
        Returns:
        postReplyResponse of type PostReplyResponse of the new reply Added.
        Throws:
        QuestionsApiException - runtime exception if an error occurs during JPA operation or in input questionId not present in the DB.

      • getListOfQuestions

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<QuestionDetails>> getListOfQuestions()
        getListOfQuestions endpoint implementation. Reads all questions in the Db and return to the requester.
        Returns:
        questionDetails of type List of the new question Added.
        Throws:
        QuestionsApiException - runtime exception if an error occurs during JPA operation.

      • getQuestionDetails

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuestionsResponse> getQuestionDetails(@PathVariable(value="questionId")
                                                                                     java.lang.Long questionId)
        createReply endpoint implementation. Input reply details are used to create the new reply in DB for a given question.
        Parameters:
        questionId - of the question for which the details are requested.
        Returns:
        questionsResponse of type QuestionsResponse of the question requested.
        Throws:
        QuestionsApiException - runtime exception if an error occurs during JPA operation or in input questionId not present in the DB.
